install.name: Content - denVideo
install.author: 3DEN Open Software
install.description:
Easily embed Videos in your site. Auto detect the video type based on file type and URL. {denvideo URL WIDTH HEIGHT AUTOSTART}
    Params Description
  • URL: Defines what video will be included, Is the only madalory param
  • WIDTH: Defines the width of the video area
  • HEIGHT: Defines the height of the video area
  • AUTOSTART: Defines the video should start automatically

param.name: youtube_rel
param.label: youTube Related
param.description: Related videos are displayed when the menu button is pressed

param.name: youtube_loop
param.label: youTube Loop
param.description: Play the initial video or playlist again and again

param.name: youtube_egm
param.label: youTube Enhanced Genie Menu
param.description: This behavior causes the genie menu (if present) to appear when the user's mouse enters the video display area

param.name: youtube_border
param.label: youTube Border
param.description: Enables a border around the entire video player

param.name: youtube_color1
param.label: youTube Color 1: #
param.description: The border's primary color. RGB Hexadecimal (22FF00)

param.name: youtube_color2
param.label: youTube Color 2: #
param.description: Control bar background color and secondary border color. RGB Hexadecimal (22FF00)

param.name: jw_logo
param.label: JW Watermark Logo
param.description: Set this to an image that can be put as a watermark logo in the top right corner of the display. Transparent PNG files give the best results

param.name: jw_backcolor
param.label: JW Backcolor
param.description: Backgroundcolor of the controls, in HEX format

param.name: jw_frontcolor
param.label: JW Frontcolor
param.description: Texts and buttons color of the controls, in HEX format

param.name: jw_lightcolor
param.label: JW Lightcolor
param.description: Rollover color of the controls, in HEX format

param.name: jw_screencolor
param.label: JW Screencolor
param.description: Color of the display area, in HEX format. With the rotator, change this to your HTML page's color make images of different sizes blend nicely.

param.name: jw_quality
param.label: JW Quality
param.description: enables high-quality playback. This sets the smoothing of videos on/off, the deblocking of videos on/off and the dimensions of the camera small/large. Is saved as cookie.
